segments.text: Come to think of it , there is one rule in this house , Mary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you go out with friends , I don't want you to stay out too late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We maintain a curfew for Cindy because she's just 16 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How late can we stay out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can stay out till 10 p . m .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But if we're going to be late ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you call me or Tom first .
segments.speaker: S1
